text: Bojnice (; ) is a town in the Trenčín Region in Slovakia. Bojnice is on the river Nitra. It is near the city of Prievidza. About 5,000 people live there. Bojnice is known for its tourist attractions like the Bojnice Zoo and the Bojnice Castle. It is also known for its spa. == Twin towns == Bojnice is twinned with: * Jeseník, Czech Republic * Bad Krozingen, Germany * Rosta, Italy == References == == Other websites == * Official town website * Bojnice Castle * Bojnice Spa Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Trenčín Region Category:Spa towns in Slovakia
title: Bojnice
